author: Christian Borgelt and Rudolf Kruse
title: Speeding Up Fuzzy Clustering with Neural Network Techniques
venue: Research Group Neural Networks and Fuzzy Systems Dept. of Knowledge Processing and Language Engineering, School of Computer Science Otto-von-Guericke-University of Magdeburg
window: the number of clusters to find (abalone: 3, breast: 2, iris: 3, wine 3), so we ran the clustering using these numbers. In addition, we ran the algorithm with 6 clusters for the abalone and the wine dataset.
